description:
Business Type: Corporate Consulting Firm

Description:
A professional consulting firm offering business strategy, digital transformation,
and operational excellence services to enterprises and startups.

Target Audience:
Corporate clients, founders, executives

Tone:
Professional, trustworthy, premium

Extra UI Notes:
- Blue/gray color palette
- Minimal design
- Strong CTA for “Book a Consultation”

pages.name: home
pages.purpose: Landing page to introduce the consulting firm and its expertise

pages.name: about
pages.purpose: Provide information about the firm's vision, mission, and team

pages.name: contact
pages.purpose: Allow potential clients to reach out for inquiries or bookings

pages.name: pricing
pages.purpose: Outline pricing models and packages (if applicable)
